WorkItem.Description: i think there is a bug while trying to read excel files with common style. i mean when u select a column (all of them) and apply a style to that column which affects all rows (not only any information included ones also) and although the excel file size is small phpexcel run into a loop and getting error of memory size exhausted. i didn't try that much but i simply get an error because of this maybe u guys need to give it a try..

Comments.Message: Sounds similar to http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/workitem/13025 which was a similar issue with Data Validation for an entire column or row
